p: Zürich I Prnp −/− mice of the C57BL/6J genetic background were generated as previously described by Bueler et al. [ 36]. As controls, we used WT mice from the same genetic background. The body weight of all animals varied between 25 and 35 g and they were either 3 or 9 months-old. Prnp −/− mice showed age-dependent behavioral abnormalities as given in the Supplementary Table S1 and and earlier reports [ 21, 37]. Five (WT group) and six ( Prnp −/− group) animals per experimental group were tested for differential mRNA expression levels.
